text:
e="preserve">Leslie Randall (19 October 1924 – 2 August 2020) was an English actor. He was born in South Shields, County Durham. He was known for starring in "Joan and Leslie", ITV's first home-grown situation comedy. He also appeared in the 1963 movie version of "Billy Liar" where he played Danny Boon.
On 2 August 2020, it was announced that Randall had died at age 95.
